statements: SELECT * FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, recognition_result FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE recognition_result = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, attendance_timestamp FROM palm_vein_recognition ORDER BY attendance_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, palm_vein_data FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE attendance_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, user_id, recognition_result FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE recognition_result = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recognitions FROM palm_vein_recognition GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT * FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE user_id = 101 AND attendance_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-05-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-05-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM attendance_timestamp)) AS avg_attendance_time FROM palm_vein_recognition GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM attendance_timestamp)) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, recognition_result, attendance_timestamp FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE attendance_timestamp::date = '2021-07-15';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, result_date FROM palm_vein_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM palm_vein_results WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, result_date FROM user_profiles JOIN palm_vein_results ON user_profiles.user_id = palm_vein_results.user_id;
SELECT user_id, result_date FROM palm_vein_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM palm_vein_recognition_results WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT user_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM attendance_tracking WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT palm_vein_data FROM palm_vein_recognition_results WHERE user_id = 4
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT user_id, palm_vein_data FROM palm_vein_recognition_results WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT user_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM attendance_tracking ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY full_name ASC

SELECT user_id, palm_vein_data, check_in_time FROM palm_vein_recognition_results JOIN attendance_tracking ON palm_vein_recognition_results.user_id = attendance_tracking.user_id WHERE check_in_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_name, palm_vein_data FROM user_profiles;
SELECT record_id, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM attendance_records;
SELECT user_id, palm_vein_match_score FROM palm_vein_results;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM palm_vein_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_name, palm_vein_data FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM attendance_records ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, palm_vein_match_score FROM user_profiles JOIN palm_vein_results ON user_profiles.user_id = palm_vein_results.user_id;
SELECT user_name, log_description FROM user_profiles JOIN palm_vein_logs ON user_profiles.user_id = palm_vein_logs.user_id WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM palm_vein_results;
SELECT user_id, vein_pattern FROM palm_vein_results WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, date, time_in, time_out FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-01-20' AND time_out IS NOT NULL;
SELECT access_level, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, vein_pattern FROM palm_vein_results WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_date FROM palm_vein_results WHERE DATE(date_time) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_rights WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM attendance_records WHERE time_out < '18:00:00');
SELECT p.permission_type, ar.date, ar.time_in FROM permissions p JOIN access_rights ar ON p.access_level = ar.access_level;
